And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went out<S>1831</S>, and departed<S>4198</S> from<S>575</S> the temple<S>2411</S>: and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> came<S>4334</S> to him for to shew<S>1925</S> him<S>846</S> the buildings<S>3619</S> of the temple<S>2411</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, See ye<S>991</S> not<S>3756</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S>? verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, There shall<S>863</S> not<S>3364</S> be left<S>863</S> here<S>5602</S> one stone<S>3037</S> upon<S>1909</S> another<S>3037</S>, that<S>3739</S> shall<S>2647</S> not<S>3364</S> be thrown down<S>2647</S>.
And<S>1161</S> as he<S>846</S> sat<S>2521</S> upon<S>1909</S> the mount<S>3735</S> of Olives<S>1636</S>, the disciples<S>3101</S> came<S>4334</S> unto him<S>846</S> privately<S>2596</S> <S>2398</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Tell<S>2036</S> us<S>2254</S>, when<S>4219</S> shall<S>2071</S> these things<S>5023</S> be<S>2071</S>? and<S>2532</S> what<S>5101</S> shall be the sign<S>4592</S> of thy<S>4674</S> coming<S>3952</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the end<S>4930</S> of the world<S>165</S>?
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Take heed<S>991</S> that no<S>3361</S> man<S>5100</S> deceive<S>4105</S> you<S>5209</S>.
For<S>1063</S> many<S>4183</S> shall come<S>2064</S> in<S>1909</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> Christ<S>5547</S>; and<S>2532</S> shall deceive<S>4105</S> many<S>4183</S>.
And<S>1161</S> ye shall<S>3195</S> hear<S>191</S> of wars<S>4171</S> and<S>2532</S> rumours<S>189</S> of wars<S>4171</S>: see<S>3708</S> that ye be<S>2360</S> not<S>3361</S> troubled<S>2360</S>: for<S>1063</S> all<S>3956</S> these things must<S>1163</S> come to pass<S>1096</S>, but<S>235</S> the end<S>5056</S> is<S>2076</S> not yet<S>3768</S>.
For<S>1063</S> nation<S>1484</S> shall rise<S>1453</S> against<S>1909</S> nation<S>1484</S>, and<S>2532</S> kingdom<S>932</S> against<S>1909</S> kingdom<S>932</S>: and<S>2532</S> there shall be<S>2071</S> famines<S>3042</S>, and<S>2532</S> pestilences<S>3061</S>, and<S>2532</S> earthquakes<S>4578</S>, in divers<S>2596</S> places<S>5117</S>.
All<S>1161</S> <S>3956</S> these<S>5023</S> are the beginning<S>746</S> of sorrows<S>5604</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> shall they deliver<S>3860</S> you<S>5209</S> up<S>3860</S> to<S>1519</S> be afflicted<S>2347</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall kill<S>615</S> you<S>5209</S>: and<S>2532</S> ye shall be<S>2071</S> hated<S>3404</S> of<S>5259</S> all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S> for<S>1223</S> my<S>3450</S> name's sake<S>3686</S>.
And<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> shall many<S>4183</S> be offended<S>4624</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall betray<S>3860</S> one another<S>240</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall hate<S>3404</S> one another<S>240</S>.
And<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> false prophets<S>5578</S> shall rise<S>1453</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall deceive<S>4105</S> many<S>4183</S>.
And<S>2532</S> because<S>1223</S> iniquity<S>458</S> shall abound<S>4129</S>, the love<S>26</S> of many<S>4183</S> shall wax cold<S>5594</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he that shall endure<S>5278</S> unto<S>1519</S> the end<S>5056</S>, the same<S>3778</S> shall be saved<S>4982</S>.
And<S>2532</S> this<S>5124</S> gospel<S>2098</S> of the kingdom<S>932</S> shall be preached<S>2784</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3650</S> the world<S>3625</S> for<S>1519</S> a witness<S>3142</S> unto all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S>; and<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> shall the end<S>5056</S> come<S>2240</S>.
When<S>3752</S> ye therefore<S>3767</S> shall see<S>1492</S> the abomination<S>946</S> of desolation<S>2050</S>, spoken of<S>4483</S> by<S>1223</S> Daniel<S>1158</S> the prophet<S>4396</S>, stand<S>2476</S> <S>2476</S> in<S>1722</S> the holy<S>40</S> place<S>5117</S>, (whoso readeth<S>314</S>, let him understand<S>3539</S>:)
Then<S>5119</S> let them which be in<S>1722</S> Judaea<S>2449</S> flee<S>5343</S> into<S>1909</S> the mountains<S>3735</S>:
Let him which is on<S>1909</S> the housetop<S>1430</S> not<S>3361</S> come down<S>2597</S> to take<S>142</S> any thing<S>5100</S> out of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3614</S>:
<S>2532</S> Neither<S>3361</S> let him which is in<S>1722</S> the field<S>68</S> return<S>1994</S> back<S>3694</S> to take<S>142</S> his<S>846</S> clothes<S>2440</S>.
And<S>1161</S> woe<S>3759</S> unto them that are<S>2192</S> with<S>1722</S> child<S>1064</S>, and<S>2532</S> to them that give suck<S>2337</S> in<S>1722</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S>!
But<S>1161</S> pray ye<S>4336</S> that<S>3363</S> your<S>5216</S> flight<S>5437</S> be<S>1096</S> not<S>3363</S> in the winter<S>5494</S>, neither<S>3366</S> on<S>1722</S> the sabbath day<S>4521</S>:
For<S>1063</S> then<S>5119</S> shall be<S>2071</S> great<S>3173</S> tribulation<S>2347</S>, such as<S>3634</S> was<S>1096</S> not<S>3756</S> since<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S> of the world<S>2889</S> to this<S>2193</S> time<S>3568</S>, no<S>3761</S>, nor ever<S>3364</S> shall be<S>1096</S>.
And<S>2532</S> except<S>1508</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S> should be shortened<S>2856</S>, there<S>3756</S> should<S>302</S> no<S>3956</S> flesh<S>4561</S> be saved<S>4982</S>: but<S>1161</S> for<S>1223</S> the elect's sake<S>1588</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S> shall be shortened<S>2856</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> if<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> shall say<S>2036</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Lo<S>2400</S>, here<S>5602</S> is Christ<S>5547</S>, or<S>2228</S> there<S>5602</S>; believe<S>4100</S> it not<S>3361</S>.
For<S>1063</S> there shall arise<S>1453</S> false Christs<S>5580</S>, and<S>2532</S> false prophets<S>5578</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall shew<S>1325</S> great<S>3173</S> signs<S>4592</S> and<S>2532</S> wonders<S>5059</S>; insomuch that<S>5620</S>, if<S>1487</S> it were possible<S>1415</S>, they shall deceive<S>4105</S> the very<S>2532</S> elect<S>1588</S>.
Behold<S>2400</S>, I have told<S>4280</S> you<S>5213</S> before<S>4280</S>.
Wherefore<S>3767</S> if<S>1437</S> they shall say<S>2036</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, he is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> the desert<S>2048</S>; go<S>1831</S> not<S>3361</S> forth<S>1831</S>: behold<S>2400</S>, he is in<S>1722</S> the secret chambers<S>5009</S>; believe<S>4100</S> it not<S>3361</S>.
For<S>1063</S> as<S>5618</S> the lightning<S>796</S> cometh<S>1831</S> out of<S>575</S> the east<S>395</S>, and<S>2532</S> shineth<S>5316</S> even unto<S>2193</S> the west<S>1424</S>; so<S>3779</S> shall<S>2071</S> also<S>2532</S> the coming<S>3952</S> of the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> be<S>2071</S>.
For<S>1063</S> wheresoever<S>1437</S> <S>3699</S> the carcase<S>4430</S> is<S>5600</S>, there<S>1563</S> will<S>4863</S> the eagles<S>105</S> be gathered together<S>4863</S>.
Immediately<S>1161</S> <S>2112</S> after<S>3326</S> the tribulation<S>2347</S> of those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S> shall the sun<S>2246</S> be darkened<S>4654</S>, and<S>2532</S> the moon<S>4582</S> shall<S>1325</S> not<S>3756</S> give<S>1325</S> her<S>846</S> light<S>5338</S>, and<S>2532</S> the stars<S>792</S> shall fall<S>4098</S> from<S>575</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, and<S>2532</S> the powers<S>1411</S> of the heavens<S>3772</S> shall be shaken<S>4531</S>:
And<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> shall appear<S>5316</S> the sign<S>4592</S> of the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>: and<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> shall<S>2875</S> all<S>3956</S> the tribes<S>5443</S> of the earth<S>1093</S> mourn<S>2875</S>, and<S>2532</S> they shall see<S>3700</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> coming<S>2064</S> in<S>1909</S> the clouds<S>3507</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> with<S>3326</S> power<S>1411</S> and<S>2532</S> great<S>4183</S> glory<S>1391</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he shall send<S>649</S> his<S>846</S> angels<S>32</S> with<S>3326</S> a great<S>3173</S> sound<S>5456</S> of a trumpet<S>4536</S>, and<S>2532</S> they shall gather together<S>1996</S> his<S>846</S> elect<S>1588</S> from<S>1537</S> the four<S>5064</S> winds<S>417</S>, from<S>575</S> one end<S>206</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> to<S>2193</S> the other<S>206</S> <S>846</S>. <sup>with: or, with a trumpet, and a great voice</sup>
Now<S>1161</S> learn<S>3129</S> a parable<S>3850</S> of<S>575</S> the fig tree<S>4808</S>; When<S>3752</S> his<S>846</S> branch<S>2798</S> is<S>1096</S> yet<S>2235</S> tender<S>527</S>, and<S>2532</S> putteth forth<S>1631</S> leaves<S>5444</S>, ye know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> summer<S>2330</S> is nigh<S>1451</S>:
So<S>3779</S> likewise<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S>, when<S>3752</S> ye shall see<S>1492</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S>, know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> it is<S>2076</S> near<S>1451</S>, even at<S>1909</S> the doors<S>2374</S>. <sup>it: or, he</sup>
Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, This<S>3778</S> generation<S>1074</S> shall not<S>3364</S> pass<S>3928</S>, till<S>302</S> <S>2193</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S> be fulfilled<S>1096</S>.
Heaven<S>3772</S> and<S>2532</S> earth<S>1093</S> shall pass away<S>3928</S>, but<S>1161</S> my<S>3450</S> words<S>3056</S> shall<S>3928</S> not<S>3364</S> pass away<S>3928</S>.
But<S>1161</S> of<S>4012</S> that<S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S> and<S>2532</S> hour<S>5610</S> knoweth<S>1492</S> no<S>3762</S> man, no, not<S>3761</S> the angels<S>32</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>, but<S>1508</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> only<S>3441</S>.
But<S>1161</S> as<S>5618</S> the days<S>2250</S> of Noe<S>3575</S> were, so<S>3779</S> shall<S>2071</S> also<S>2532</S> the coming<S>3952</S> of the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> be<S>2071</S>.
For<S>1063</S> as<S>5618</S> in<S>1722</S> the days<S>2250</S> that were<S>2258</S> before<S>4253</S> the flood<S>2627</S> they were eating<S>5176</S> and<S>2532</S> drinking<S>4095</S>, marrying<S>1060</S> and<S>2532</S> giving in marriage<S>1547</S>, until<S>891</S> the day<S>2250</S> that<S>3739</S> Noe<S>3575</S> entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the ark<S>2787</S>,
And<S>2532</S> knew<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> until<S>2193</S> the flood<S>2627</S> came<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> took<S>142</S> them all<S>537</S> away<S>142</S>; so<S>3779</S> shall<S>2071</S> also<S>2532</S> the coming<S>3952</S> of the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> be<S>2071</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> shall<S>2071</S> two<S>1417</S> be<S>2071</S> in<S>1722</S> the field<S>68</S>; the one<S>1520</S> shall be taken<S>3880</S>, and<S>2532</S> the other<S>1520</S> left<S>863</S>.
Two<S>1417</S> women shall be grinding<S>229</S> at<S>1722</S> the mill<S>3459</S>; the one<S>3391</S> shall be taken<S>3880</S>, and<S>2532</S> the other<S>3391</S> left<S>863</S>.
Watch<S>1127</S> therefore<S>3767</S>: for<S>3754</S> ye know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> what<S>4169</S> hour<S>5610</S> your<S>5216</S> Lord<S>2962</S> doth come<S>2064</S>.
But<S>1161</S> know<S>1097</S> this<S>1565</S>, that<S>3754</S> if<S>1487</S> the goodman of the house<S>3617</S> had known<S>1492</S> in what<S>4169</S> watch<S>5438</S> the thief<S>2812</S> would come<S>2064</S>, he would<S>302</S> have watched<S>1127</S>, and<S>2532</S> would<S>302</S> not<S>3756</S> have suffered<S>1439</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3614</S> to be broken up<S>1358</S>.
Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> be<S>1096</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> ready<S>2092</S>: for<S>3754</S> in such<S>3739</S> an hour<S>5610</S> as ye think<S>1380</S> not<S>3756</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> cometh<S>2064</S>.
Who<S>5101</S> then<S>686</S> is<S>2076</S> a faithful<S>4103</S> and<S>2532</S> wise<S>5429</S> servant<S>1401</S>, whom<S>3739</S> his<S>846</S> lord<S>2962</S> hath made ruler<S>2525</S> over<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> household<S>2322</S>, to give<S>1325</S> them<S>846</S> meat<S>5160</S> in<S>1722</S> due season<S>2540</S>?
Blessed<S>3107</S> is that<S>1565</S> servant<S>1401</S>, whom<S>3739</S> his<S>846</S> lord<S>2962</S> when he cometh<S>2064</S> shall find<S>2147</S> so<S>3779</S> doing<S>4160</S>.
Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> he shall make<S>2525</S> him<S>846</S> ruler<S>2525</S> over<S>1909</S> all<S>3956</S> his<S>846</S> goods<S>5224</S>.
But and<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> that<S>1565</S> evil<S>2556</S> servant<S>1401</S> shall say<S>2036</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> heart<S>2588</S>, My<S>3450</S> lord<S>2962</S> delayeth<S>5549</S> his coming<S>2064</S>;
And<S>2532</S> shall begin<S>756</S> to smite<S>5180</S> his fellowservants<S>4889</S>, and<S>1161</S> to eat<S>2068</S> and<S>2532</S> drink<S>4095</S> with<S>3326</S> the drunken<S>3184</S>;
The lord<S>2962</S> of that<S>1565</S> servant<S>1401</S> shall come<S>2240</S> in<S>1722</S> a day<S>2250</S> when<S>3739</S> he looketh<S>4328</S> not<S>3756</S> for him, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> an hour<S>5610</S> that<S>3739</S> he is<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> aware of<S>1097</S>,
And<S>2532</S> shall cut<S>1371</S> him<S>846</S> asunder<S>1371</S>, and<S>2532</S> appoint<S>5087</S> him his<S>846</S> portion<S>3313</S> with<S>3326</S> the hypocrites<S>5273</S>: there<S>1563</S> shall be<S>2071</S> weeping<S>2805</S> and<S>2532</S> gnashing<S>1030</S> of teeth<S>3599</S>. <sup>cut: or, cut him off</sup>
